entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Grand Falls-Windsor
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:13 AM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -22.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Badger 05:30 AM NST Friday 10 February 2023
Temperature: -22.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.2 kPa rising
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -26
Dewpoint: -25.2°C
Wind: NW 4 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy beginning early this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas overnight. Amount 15 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this evening then northeast 30 gusting to 50 overnight. Low minus 10 with temperature rising to minus 5 by morning. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 10 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Flurries. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 10 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Friday 10 February 2023
